name: BUNLabTest
title: BUN Lab Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab test codes commonly used for a blood/serum/plasma Blood Urea Nitrogen lab test using a Mass/volume measurement.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a lab test for Blood Urea Nitrogen  based on a specimen source  of blood/serum/plasma. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to 'Laboratory Test, Result' or 'Laboratory Test, Order' datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Blood Urea Nitrogen lab test using the specimen source of blood/serum/plasma based on a measurement scale of Mass/volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Blood Urea Nitrogen lab test using the specimen source of capillary blood or any other specimen source)

concept.display: Urea nitrogen [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma

contains.display: Urea nitrogen [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
